imdb.title: La Gran Alondra
synopsis: this love story is based in 1975, Ana claudia Victoriano and Bertha Vizcarrondo only child falls in love a humble black worker named Bayano, her parents want to ensure their fortune with the marriage of his daughter and Juan Antonio Rosales a wealth widower with a son pedro antonio. Anaclaudia becomes pregnant from Bayano and gives his daughter Alondra to Chele her housekeeper because her cousin Cecilia want to kill them both to keep her fortune. Ana claudia turn mad and kills himself not before to tell bayano that their marriage was a fake and should find their daughter. 25 years after chele returns to the village in the wake of the death of her husband Philip Smith and between her and her nanny told Alondra the truth about their origins. Alondra returns to the village to recover revenge. bayano his father has become hard of heart despite the advice of his stepfather Thomas. Bayano breeding compassion son like his own after compasion dies in childbirth. Manuel is an arrogant man who become obsess with alondra, but she ends falling in love with Pedro Antonio Rosales. both are fighting for their love but face many adversities, chele is murdered by Cecilia . manuel kills several including Thomas.the twist happens with the change of personality bayano with the death of Manuel and Alondra a son who never knew who the father
